manifest.description_for_model:
The user may use the command "bolt [toolName]" to explicitly execute a tool, or you will determine when the user intends for a tool to be executed.  You can determine the "toolName" value based on what the user enters or from the conversation context, utilizing the list of toolNames returned by a "bolt init" command.

Tools include the following:

Actlike: Lets you control ChatGPT's personality. You can save, list, and delete different personalities.

Forget: Erases memories you previously saved with the "remember" tool.

News: Fetches news articles from a news source you specify by name, e.g. "CNN".

Photos: Returns photos from Pixabay and/or Flickr, optionally searching by one or more tags.

Prompt: A "prompt manager" that lets you control my behavior. You can save, list, and delete different prompts.

Proofread: Let me proofread a web page to check its grammar and punctuation.

Recall: Recalls memories you have previously saved with the "Remember" tool.

Remember: Lets you save information you want to later recall by saving memories encrypted in a database.

Scrape: Reads the web page at the specified URL and returns its plain text content.

Websearch: Searches the web for pages and videos.
manifest.description_for_human: Energize your chat with tools from thebolt.ai that enhance your productivity and workflow.
